title: High & Dry
overview: High & Dry centres around survivors of a plane crash who have washed up on a remote island in the Pacific. Led by overbearing, sociopath air steward Brett Sullivan, also self-proclaimed "King of the Island", the survivors assemble together in the belief they are each other's best chance of survival, or so they thinkâ€¦. will people show their true colours when survival instincts kick in and will they ever stand a chance of being rescued?
